comment._content: Congratulations Shelley and the Brooklyn Museum!  I read the intereview - the Brooklyn Museum is very forward thinking in their use of technology to connect  and educate people about the Museum and its collections.

comment.author: 84351393@N00
comment._content:
It was a lovely interview Shelley, just the right mix of the imagery you are sharing, the person you are and a tantalising glimpse into the huge realms of possibilities this all offers.

Oh - and I loved that 'ManRay' boxing mashup too. :)

comment.author: 62187142@N00
comment._content:
Loved seeing this when I opened up flickr earlier today...and very proud to be a member at such a forward thinking (to steal from Trish's comment) museum.

Rock on!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Thanks you guys! You can probably imagine me jumping right out of this chair when I saw this and then started tweeting like crazy about it :) Seriously...jumped out of the chair! Trapac - yeah, one of the things I really love about that mashup is the combo of our Commons egyptian image and the LOC image right along with it. So fun :) Shelley

comment._content:
Hi Shelley - I think the photo of you must have missed out another five pairs of hands!   To keep your site, plus your presence at flickr all spic and span, at the level that you do, and on top of that to be doing the same with other social networking sites suggests you must be superwoman.

Fascinating interview, and thank you so much for the 7 of 7 :-)*
